

.. _sphx_glr_gallery_02_statistical_plots:

Statistical Plots
=================

Statistical visualization examples including histograms, distributions, error bars,
and probability density functions for data analysis and scientific research.



.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnails">

.. thumbnail-parent-div-open

.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Probability density functions.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery/02_statistical_plots/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_probability_density_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_02_statistical_plots_plot_probability_density.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Probability Density</div>
    </div>

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Violin and box plots.">

    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_02_statistical_plots_plot_violin_box.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Violin and Box Plots</div>

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Error Bars</div>

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_02_statistical_plots_plot_kde_plots.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Kernel Density Estimation</div>
